basics.name: Gary Thomas
basics.label: Architect
basics.summary: Gary is originally from the UK, but has lived in Australia and New Zealand for the last 20 years. He originally studied Computer Science at Stafforshire University (or North Staffs Polytechnic as it was known back then) before starting his first job as a technologist (software engineer) at GPT in Liverpool, UK.

work.name: Pied Piper
work.summary: Pied Piper is a multi-platform technology based on a proprietary universal compression algorithm that has consistently fielded high Weisman Scoresâ„¢ that are not merely competitive, but approach the theoretical limit of lossless compression.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding clubs for young people.

publications.name: Video compression for 3d media
publications.summary: Innovative middle-out compression algorithm that changes the way we store data.

references.name: Erlich Bachman
references.reference: It is my pleasure to recommend Richard, his performance working as a consultant for Main St. Company proved that he will be a valuable addition to any company.
